Are you okay?"/pause 800/stopAnimation Peeta/pause 200/showFrame Peeta 0/pause 800/emote Peeta 12/pause 800/speak Peeta "$15Ugh, yeah...I'm fine."/pause 600/shake Peeta 1000/message "Peeta dusts himself off."/pause 600/speak Peeta "$15Just tripped. I've become more prone to it since I got my prosthetic."/pause 800/message "Let me help you with those groceries."/pause 800/speak Peeta "$29Thanks, @."/pause 2000/globalFade/viewPort -1000 -1000/changeLocation Saloon/warp Peeta 15 21/warp farmer 14 21/faceDirection Peeta 2/faceDirection farmer 1/globalFadeToClear/viewPort 14 19 true/pause 2000/speak Peeta "$29Thanks for helping me. Entries.Wem.Peeta_7Hearts/d Mon/d Tue/d Wed/d Th: AbigailFlute/54 6/farmer 59 6 3 Peeta 54 6 0/skippable/showFrame Peeta 8/pause 2000/move farmer -4 0 3/pause 800/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Peeta "@, hey."/pause 500/speak Peeta "You probably think it's weird that I'm here, huh?$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Peeta "Yeah, I don't really like coming to the mines."/pause 500/speak Peeta "$17I mean, I don't usually have a reason to be here anyway. It was...bleak and dangerous."/pause 500/speak Peeta "$25But that was all...destroyed."/pause 500/speak Peeta "$2I just finished my deliveries and was about to go back, but I just stopped here."/pause 500/speak Peeta "$24I guess I felt homesick.
